doc.name: WebContent
doc.description: Base class for attributes defining content for export to web. This class provides parameters that control the size of the text box for editing the content and also a parameter that defines what to display in the model.
doc.author: Edward A. Lee
doc.property: Parameter giving the text to display in the Ptolemy model. This defaults to "Content for Export to Web".
Parameter specifying the height of the editing box. This is an int that defaults to 20.
Parameter specifying the width of the editing box. This is an int that defaults to 60.
